name: Spicy Fisherman's Pie
author: STRIPELAND
summary: A hearty meal in one casserole with cod fillets and vegetables in a creamy sauce, topped with mashed potatoes and cheese.
ingredients: 1 cup heavy cream or single cream
2 (6 ounce) fillets cod or other white fish fillets, cut into 1-inch pieces
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Lightly grease a 9x13 inch baking dish
Place potatoes into a pot with enough water to cover
Bring to a boil, and cook until tender, about 10 minutes
Drain and mash with milk and butter until smooth
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Fry onion and carrots in the oil until starting to soften
Season with salt, pepper and chili powder
Stir in the cream and parsley, and remove from the heat
Place fish in an even layer in the bottom of the prepared baking dish
Pour the cream and vegetable mixture over the fish, then cover with a layer of mashed potatoes
Sprinkle shredded cheese over the top
Bake for 40 minutes in the preheated oven, or until piping hot throughout
